item.title: 1 in 3 Workers Think They’ll Never Have Financial Security, a New Survey Says
item.description: A new survey by Bankrate finds nearly half of people think they’d need to earn over $100,000 to feel all right about their finances.

item.title: Gen-Z’s Obsession With ‘Nostalgia Tech’ Could Be Your Next Marketing Opportunity
item.description: Retro-tech is a trend worth watching, as young people have a fondness for simpler, more tactile technology.

item.title: Top 11 Best Workplaces in Tampa
item.description: All of these companies based in the Tampa metropolitan area made Inc.’s 2025 Best Workplaces list.

item.title: Paige DeSorbo Is Changing the Influencer Brand Playbook
item.description: The ‘Summer House’ and Giggly Squad star is determined to make Daphne a massive name—and she’s ready to do it without TV.

item.title: Young People Can’t Find Jobs. Is AI to Blame?
item.description: People in their 20s seem to love AI, but new unemployment data may give them reason to resent it.
